text: Babangida is a Nigerian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Ibrahim Babangida, former military ruler of Nigeria *Maryam Babangida, former first lady of Nigeria *Three footballer brothers **Tijani Babangida (born 1973), Nigerian footballer **Ibrahim Babangida (footballer) (born 1976), Nigerian footballer **Haruna Babangida (born 1982), Nigerian footballer
title: Babangida
